title: {LFP} Looking For An ADC To Duo With
body:
I've recently become a thresh main and I'm looking for an ADC to duo queue with in normals and ranked. I actually want someone who I can be friends with rather than just someone who is only there to play. I would prefer playing with silver V - Gold III but honestly I'm not fussed as long as you aren't garbage.

If you're interested then add me:
In-game: ConnTroller
Skype: lolconntroller

See you on the rift,
ConnTroller
